name: Blazing
desc: An active flame that will scorch any that draw too near.
effect: The first time a creature enters a Blazing space on a Turn or ends their Turn in it they take 2 _Fire_ Damage. If they are in the space at the end of the _Round_ they gain _Alight_ 1. If a creature occupies multiple Blazing spaces do not resolve this more than their Size times.
interactions: If a _Watersource_ is placed in this space, reduce its value by 1 and make the space _Veiled_.
If placed in a _Watersource_ space, reduce the _Watersource_'s value by 1 and make the space _Veiled_.

name: Deep Water
desc: Terrain that represents still water that a creature must swim in.
effect: Characters must _Swim_ through this Terrain. When a creature enters this space or ends their _Turn_ in it, inflict _Soaked_ 2.  Whenever this space inflicts _Soaked_, reduce the value by an equivalent amount.
destroy: Replace this space with _Shallow Water_ at 1 _Elevation_ lower than it was originally.

name: Fortified
desc: A piece of terrain that, while not providing cover, provides some form of defense.
effect: Creatures have +1 _Guard_ while in a Fortified space. A creature may only benefit from a single Fortified space at a time.

name: Frigid Air
desc: Air chilled to painful, frost-inducing cold.
effect: The first time a creature enters a Frigid Air space on a _Turn_ or ends their _Turn_ in it they take 1 _Cold_ Damage. If they end the _Round_ in this space, they gain _Frost_ 1. If a creature occupies multiple Frigid Air spaces do not resolve this more than their Size times.

name: Frozen
desc: Terrain that has been covered with slick, slippery ice.
effect:
While on Frozen _Terrain_ a creature suffers the following effects:
* Increase any _Forced Movement_ inflicted on a creature in this space by 1.
* The cost to Negate any _Forced Movement_ in this space is increased by 1.
* Increase the cost to negate all _Prone_ effects inflicted on them by 1.
* A creature that starts their _Turn_ on a Frozen space loses 1 space of Movement. A creature may expend 1 _Stamina_ to negate this penalty.
destroy: An _Area_ Attack that deals at least 5 Damage will _Destroy_ this space, as will an _Area_ _Flame_ Attack or any _Flame_ Attack targeting a creature in this space. If _Destroyed_ by a _Flame_ Attack, replace it with _Wet_.

name: Jagged
desc: Sharp spires of earth and stone make traveling through this space painful.
effect: Anytime a creature enters a Jagged space or ends a turn there they immediately take 2 Stab Damage and gain _Bleed_ 1 [_Avoidable_]. If they end a _Jump_ in this space, they instead take 3 Stab Damage and gain _Bleed_ 2 [_Avoidable_]. An individual space may only effect a creature once per _Turn_.

name: Roaring
desc: A hungry flame devouring all that draws near.
effect: The first time a creature enters a Roaring space on a Turn or ends their Turn in it they take 4 _Fire_ Damage. If they are in the space at the end of the _Round_ they gain _Alight_ 2. If a creature occupies multiple Roaring spaces do not resolve this more than their Size times. This space counts as _Blazing_ for all other effects.
destroy: When _Destroyed_, replace this with a _Blazing_ space.
interactions: If a _Watersource_ is placed in this space, and has a value of 1, _Destroy_ this space. Otherwise, reduce the _Watersource_'s value by 2 then _Destroy_ this, making it _Veiled_ instead of _Blazing_.
If placed in a _Watersource_ space, reduce the _Watersource_'s value by 2 and make the space _Veiled_. If the _Watersource_ had a value of 1, instead make the space _Blazing_.

name: Uneven Earth
desc: Ground full of unsure footing and low obstacles that makes traveling through it difficult.

name: Running Water
desc: Terrain that represents a slow-moving body of water.
effect: Characters must _Swim_ through this Terrain. When a creature enters this space or ends their _Turn_ in it, inflict _Soaked_ 2.

name: Rushing Water
desc: Terrain that represents a rapids or similarly fast-moving body of water.
effect: Characters must _Swim_ through this Terrain. Running Water has a direction. At the end of each even _Phase_, inflict _Push_ 1 in the direction of the Running Water on all creatures in it. When a creature enters this space or ends their _Turn_ in it, inflict _Soaked_ 2.

name: Shallow Water
desc: Terrain that represents water that is deep enough that a creature must wade through it, but not deep enough to swim.
effect: Movement through this _Terrain_ costs twice as much. When a creature enters this space or ends their _Turn_ in it, inflict _Soaked_ 1. If a creature becomes _Prone_ in this space they gain _Soaked_ 1. Whenever this space inflicts _Soaked_, reduce the value by an equivalent amount. If _Destroyed_, this space becomes _Wet_.

name: Solid Ground
desc: An unremarkable space with no notable features to speak of.

name: Veiled
desc: Terrain filled with dust, smoke, mist, or some other obscuring agent.

name: Wet
desc: Terrain drenched in water that limits a stable footing.
effect:
While on Wet _Terrain_ a creature suffers the following effects:
* The cost to Negate any _Forced Movement_ in this space is increased by 1.
* Increase the cost to negate all _Prone_ effects inflicted on them by 1.
interactions: If a _Watersource_ space would become Wet, instead place a Wet space in an adjacent space or increase its value by 1 if it is below its maximum value.
